alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued June 15 at 3:24AM PDT until June 15 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28. * WHERE...Northern Elko County and Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
